Quick Fit

Free, no ads.

Quick Fit is an useful tool when you need to perform a regression on some data.

What it is.

With Quick Fit you can insert some data and perform linear or exponential regressions on it. You can save data series so that you never lose them, and plot graphs of you regressions. This app uses AndroidPlot, huge thanks to them !

What it can do:

  • Save a serie of numeric data.
  • Plot a linear regression.
  • Plot a weighted linear regression.
  • Plot a exponention regression.

How it looks like.

Learn more and download our application by visiting its official store page.
